pages.text: With their waterproof coats, Labradors were originally bred to retrieve fish and nets from the water for their fisherman.$(br2)Standing at just under a block tall, these steadfast dogs come in three coats.
These dogs can most commonly be found near various bodies of water in warm biomes. They can also be found near cold shorelines, and more rarely in swamps.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Salmon Treat.
